inclusion.criterion: diagnosed with advanced or metastatic prostate cancer
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: His disease is ranked as mild, Hoehn-Yahr Stage I. He is complaining of slowness of movement and tremors.

inclusion.criterion: able to read and speak English
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He is an alert and cooperative man who does not have any signs of dementia.

exclusion.criterion: not diagnosed with advanced or metastatic prostate cancer
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: His disease is ranked as mild, Hoehn-Yahr Stage I.

exclusion.criterion: not able to read and speak English
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: He is an alert and cooperative man who does not have any signs of dementia.

notes: The patient has Parkinson's disease with mild symptoms. He is offered Levodopa and Trihexyphenidyl.
